title: Why do we need alone time? | Anna De Schutter | TEDxYouth@LFNY
description:
Most people have surely experienced that feeling we all have sometimes when we want to stay in with comfort food and a glass of wine (for those who are over 21 of course), avoiding at all costs the chore of speaking to people. Although you always feel a little guilty, Anna will give you reason not to. Anna explains that the time we spend alone is an opportunity for contemplation and focus.

Anna De Schutter is a 12th grader at the LFNY.

This talk was given at a TEDx event using the TED conference format but independently organized by a local community. Learn more at https://www.ted.com/tedx
author: Anna De Shutter
